creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: profile of rooster in lower center facing L grooming his chest feathers; standing next to crooked tree with small wrinkled foliage and white flowers
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Seals, and Label

L edge:[晩年六十ゆう四] (late in life, sixty four years old)
markings: L edge: [ka]; [tei]; LRC; label R roller end: [So Shiseki / 1712-1786 / Dated age 64 / Rooster / 1775 / #58]

title: Rooster
